item.title: Why doesnt my mining work? look at my case plz
item.dc:creator: @x_pk3r_xx x pk3r xx
item.description:
@x_pk3r_xx wrote:

i got some purple mining rocks, ID = 2111, so i created the case:

case 2111: if (actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You gain some mining exp, and some cash."); actionTimer = 10; setAnimation(624); addSkillXP((1700 * playerLevel[14]), 14); addItem(995, 1000000); stillgfx(199, absY, absX); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break;

when i click an purple rock nothing happens at all.
do i have to put something in any other file? or is this case wrong?
plz help? :([br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 24, 2008, 07:17:40 pm[/size][hr]anyone? -.-

Read full topic
item.source: Why doesnt my mining work? look at my case plz
